name: Clark Geomatics Banff/Yoho/Kootenay National Parks Recreation Map
description: This recreation map and visitor guide covers popular hiking trails and attractions in Banff, Yoho and Kootenay National Parks. It covers 80 recommended sights, attractions and scenic drives in the southern Canadian Rockies, and lists over 100 hikes. Waterproof, tear-resistant, and with an approximate scale of 1:250,000.
